thread.title: ThredUp raises $81M to help more people sell their old clothes
thread.title_full: ThredUp raises $81M to help more people sell their old clothes - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: ThredUp raises $81M to help more people sell their old clothes
text: Second-hand marketplace ThredUp is announcing a large $81 million round of investor funding led by Goldman Sachs Investment Partners. The new money is aimed at growing the company’s consumer base. ThredUp is one of an increasing number of niche online marketplaces that offer a more curated experience than eBay’s giant store of used wares. ThredUp deals exclusively in used apparel, buying […] »
